solutions.java_not_found: Install Java 17+ (recommended: Adoptium Temurin) from https://adoptium.net/ and ensure it's in your PATH, or set the Java path in instance settings.
solutions.java_version_too_old: Install Java {{required}}+ from https://adoptium.net/ — current Minecraft versions require modern Java.
solutions.server_jar_not_specified: Set the path to your server.jar in instance settings.
solutions.server_jar_not_found: Download the official Minecraft server from https://www.minecraft.net/download/server or check the path in settings.
solutions.eula_not_accepted: Accept the Minecraft EULA by clicking 'Accept EULA' in server settings, or manually set eula=true in eula.txt.
solutions.port_in_use: Port {{port}} is already in use. Stop the other application or change the server port in settings.
solutions.out_of_memory: Increase the RAM allocation in server settings (e.g. 4G or 8G), or close other applications to free memory.
solutions.world_corrupt: Restore the world from a backup, or delete the world folder to generate a new one.
solutions.invalid_jar: Re-download the server jar from the official source. The current file may be incomplete or corrupted.
solutions.permission_denied: Run saba-chan as administrator, or change file permissions to allow read/write access.
solutions.working_dir_error: Create the directory manually or choose a different location with write permissions.
solutions.server_overloaded: Reduce view-distance and simulation-distance, decrease max-players, or allocate more RAM.
